column6:
Alex goes to school, the robots deliver some poisoned gifts, Omega gets a day job and The Unparalleled Mink goes a-courtin' in this third issue of the mysterious, absurd and poignant tale of the mute superhero from another world, a revival of the Gerber-Skrenes cult legend by novelist Jonathan Lethem.,2007,12
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Farel Dalrymple | colorist:Paul Hornschemeier | writer:Jonathan Lethem | writer:Karl Rusnak
